original_text: He is able to deal gently with those who are ignorant and are going astray, since he himself is subject to weakness.
korean_text: 그가 무식하고 미혹된 자를 능히 용납할 수 있는 것은 자기도 연약에 휩싸여 있음이라

sentences.original_text: He is able to deal gently
since he himself is subject to weakness
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 그 자신도 연약함에 속해 있기 때문입니다
